control_attributes.control_description: The organization protects the integrity of information prior to storage on read-only media and controls the media after such information has been recorded onto the media.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs [Assignment: organization-defined out-of-band channels] for the physical delivery or electronic transmission of [Assignment: organization-defined information, information system components, or devices] to [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or information systems].

Control Statement: The organization protects the integrity of information prior to storage on read-only media and controls the media after such information has been recorded onto the media.
